# harmony

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

Harmony is a package containing a shiny app designed to present data utilizing Spotify's
API. The project is designed to learn about utilizing golem and implementing functions and 
modules into the shiny app. The original app can be used at 
'https://gtdoering.shinyapps.io/Spotify/?_ga=2.43737061.1539164132.1626388630-530399822.1626113566'."
